title: Katy Perry Brought Down the House Literally During Her Brit Awards Performance
text:
› Katy Perry Brought Down the House (Literally) During Her Brit Awards Performance Katy Perry Brought Down the House (Literally) During Her Brit Awards Performance Mike Marsland/WireImage by: Kelsey Glein 
Katy Perry 's performance at the 2017 Brit Awards was chock full of buzz-worthy moments, but did we really expect anything less? 
The singer dominated the stage at the annual awards show at London's famous O2 Arena today, where she gave a show-stopping rendition of her new single " Chained to the Rhythm ." But it wasn't your average performance. Perry's routine was given among a backdrop of small white houses (costumes worn by her backup dancers) that moved to the tune of her hit song—and in a sure-to-go viral moment, one of her house dancers even fell off the stage. Dave J Hogan/Getty 
— Ali (@ChocMilkSheikh1) February 22, 2017 
Two giant skeleton puppets—one wearing a black suit and a red tie and the other wearing a red skirt suit—also joined the star, who wore a custom Adam Selman ensemble while onstage that included a satin striped suit blazer, bustier, and matching trousers. Adam Selman x Converse sneakrs completed her stylish look. Gareth Cattermole/Getty 
VIDEO: 10 of Katy Perry's Best Instagrams 
At the end of the extravaganza, fireworks shot off from the skeleton's huge hands as Perry embraced her co-performer Skip Marley. Talk about a major statement. Mike Marsland/WireImage
